rewardPerToken().details: - To calculuate the amount of rewards per token staked

returns._0: uint256 - The amount of rewards per token staked

stakeToken(uint256,address).details: - to stake tokens into the pool

params._amount: - the amount of tokens to stake

withdrawToken(uint256,address).details: - to withdraw tokens from the pool

params._amount: - the amount of tokens to withdraw
